00002 #define TBTrack_TrackFitResult_HH

00004 #include <string>

00007 #include "TMatrixDSym.h"
00008

00010 namespace TBTrack {
00011 
00012   class TrackFitResult {
00013     
00014   public:
00015     TrackFitResult();  
00016     TrackFitResult(double p0, double p1, const TMatrixDSym &e,
00017                    double c, unsigned h);
00018     
00019     void parameters(double p0, double p1);
00020     
00021     // The intercept and gradient of the track on a sloped plane
00022     // in the coordinate system within the plane
00023     // The plane intersection at coordinate = 0 is at z
00024     // The plane makes an angle a to the coordinate axis
00025     // so a plane normal to the z axis has a = 0
00026     
00027     double intercept(double z=0.0, double a=0.0) const;
00028     double  gradient(              double a=0.0) const;
00029     
00030     // The error matrix of the above quantities
00031     
00032     TMatrixDSym errorMatrix(double z=0.0, double a=0.0) const;
00033     void        errorMatrix(const TMatrixDSym &e);
00034     
00035     double interceptError(double z=0.0, double a=0.0) const;
00036     double  gradientError(              double a=0.0) const;
00037     
00038     // The fit chi-squared
00039     
00040     double chiSquared() const;
00041     void   chiSquared(double c);
00042     
00043     int numberOfDof() const;
00044     double probability() const;
00045     
00046     unsigned hitPattern() const;
00047     void     hitPattern(unsigned h);
00048     
00049     unsigned numberOfHits() const;
00050     
00051     std::ostream& print(std::ostream &o=std::cout, const std::string &s="") const;
00052     
00053     enum {numberOfInts=0};
00054     const int* intData() const;
00055     int* intData();
00056     
00057     enum {numberOfFloats=0};
00058     const float* floatData() const;
00059     float* floatData();
00060     
00061     enum {numberOfDoubles=6};
00062     const double* doubleData() const;
00063     double* doubleData();
00064     
00065   protected:
00066     double _parameters[2];
00067     double _errorMatrix[3];
00068     double _chiSquared;
00069     int _hitPattern;
00070   };
00071 
00072 }
00073 
00074 #endif
